headline: Jim Cramer Says Honeywell Has Been One of the “Hapless Performers”
summary: Honeywell International Inc. (NASDAQ:HON) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared his takes on. Cramer mentioned the stock during the episode and commented: “I’m also seeing rebounds in some underperforming industrial stocks that are not part of the data center business, which therefore made them uninvestable in 2025. These were beaten down because they […]

headline: Is Honeywell International (HON) Pricing Reflect Long Term Value After Recent Share Price Gains
summary: If you are wondering whether Honeywell International's current share price lines up with its underlying worth, this article provides a clear look at what the market might be pricing in. Honeywell's shares recently closed at US$205.24, with returns of 5.2% over the last 7 days, 7.9% over 30 days, 4.8% year to date, 1.1% over 1 year, 7.6% over 3 years, and 15.6% over 5 years. Recent attention on Honeywell has been shaped by broader discussions around industrials and capital goods companies,...
